description: List showing in which GM test sites within the National Institute of Agricultural BotanyÂ’s Huntingdon road research grounds in Cambridge trials have been conducted since 1990, including National List Trials; which GM crop was tested in each case; what GM traits were in the crops; which company was granted the release consent; which areas of each plot were used; and what the six figure map reference was for each trial plot.
department: Dept for Environment Food and Rural Affairs
